description: Detects suspicious sub processes started by the Manage Engine ServiceDesk Plus Java web service process
author: Florian Roth
false_positives: Legitimate sub processes started by Manage Engine ServiceDesk Pro
name: Manage Engine Java Suspicious Sub Process
query: (process.parent.executable.text:*\\ManageEngine\\ServiceDesk\\* AND process.parent.executable.text:*\\java.exe* AND process.executable.text:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\sh.exe OR *\\bash.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe OR *\\schtasks.exe OR *\\certutil.exe OR *\\whoami.exe OR *\\bitsadmin.exe OR *\\wscript.exe OR *\\cscript.exe OR *\\scrcons.exe OR *\\wmic.exe OR *\\mshta.exe OR *\\forfiles.exe OR *\\mftrace.exe OR *\\AppVLP.exe OR *\\curl.exe OR *\\notepad.exe))
